A cardboard box can be used to create a DIY fort or playhouse for children. Cut out windows and doors, and paint the box to make it more fun and engaging.
A cardboard box can be used to store and transport small items, such as books or office supplies. It is durable, lightweight, and can be easily customized with labels or markings.
A cardboard box can be used as a base for a homemade birdhouse or bird feeder. Cut out a small entrance and a few ventilation holes, and paint the box to attract birds.
A cardboard box can be used as a planter for small plants or herbs. Cut out drainage holes and fill the box with soil and compost.
